name: Office Halloween Party
description:
Game made for the Finnish College Game Jam #3

You wake up in the middle of the night after a night of partying at the office Halloween Party. You hear some strange noises and see that no one is around anymore. You try to figure out what the hell is going on and it doesn't go that well..

IF it bugs out after death -> just restart game, didn't have time to make the main menu.

Time used: 

4 days, ~3-5 hours per day

Controls!

WASD Movement
Mouse to rotate,
E to Interact with Light Switches, Doors and certain events. 

HINTS!

There are 10 books you have to collect, they make a slight noise when near them. One book is hidden behind an event, find clues to find what to do!
